```{r}
library('DEoptimR')


Noisy_Quartic= function(x)
  {
  Num=length(x)  
  sumx4=0
  for(1 in 1:Num)
    { sumx4=sumx4+i*x[i]**4}

  sumx4=sumx4+runif(1)
  return(sumx4)
  }
# f(x)=0 x=(0,0) [âˆ’1.28, 1.28]


dim=30
RUNS=50
Y=0;X=0

for(i in 1:RUNS)
  {
  JDE_R=JDEoptim(rep(-1.28, dim), rep(1.28, dim), Noisy_Quartic,
         tol = 1e-20,NP=100, trace = FALSE,  maxiter =1000)
  Y[i]=JDE_R$value

  }


print(Y)
MEAN=mean(Y)
STD=sd(Y)
MAX=max(Y)
MIN=min(Y)
cat('NoisyQuartic JDE DIM=',dim,'RUNS=',RUNS,'\n')
cat('MEAN=',MEAN,'\n')
cat('MAX',MAX,'\n')
cat('MIN=',MIN,'\n')
cat('STD',STD,'\n')


```
